EmailTemplate.name: Late Deliveries
EmailTemplate.subject: Philadelphia Inquirer - Late Deliveries
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello, {!Contact.FirstName}:
We sincerely apologize for the late deliveries you experienced. A message has been sent to the field in order to ensure your deliveries will be made by our guaranteed delivery time of 6:30am on the weekdays and 8:00am on the weekends going forward. Again, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
Don't forget you may report a missed delivery, schedule a vacation, and access the Digital Replica Edition by going to the Subscriber Service Website: https://myaccount.philly.com
